definition: Hubei 湖北 and Hunan 湖南 provinces

sentences.english: From the perspective of immigrants, the thesis study on the folk dwelling of Hunan & Hubei, under the influence of complex conditions.
sentences.chinese: 本文以移民的角度來研究複雜條件影響下的兩湖民居。

sentences.english: The excavation provides important materials for studies on Tang tombs in Hubei and Hunan areas.
sentences.chinese: 該墓的發掘爲研究兩湖地區唐墓提供了重要資料。
